001package io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour;
002
003import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.State;
004
005/**
006 * Called during an update cycle before any changes have been made This means
007 * any references to state refers to current state, but any references to
008 * history refer to the previous state. This does not override any
009 * BehaviourState functions but is here because
010 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy.PolicyModel the policy model} does override
011 * the first phase
012 */
013public interface BehaviourModel extends State.BehaviourState {
014
015}
